summary: A bank-robbery in London prevents - again - the marriage of Bulldog Drummond with his girlfriend. But this time when the delinquents are caught it will be celebrated at last.
cast: John Howard|Heather Angel|H.B. Warner|Reginald Denny|E.E. Clive|Elizabeth Patterson|Eduardo Ciannelli|Gerald Hamer|John Sutton|Neil Fitzgerald|Louis Mercier|Adia Kuznetzoff|Adrienne D'Ambricourt|Matthew Boulton|Clyde Cook|George Davis|Jacques Lory|John Power|Wyndham Standing|David Torrence
director: Director: James P. Hogan (as James Hogan)
title: La novia de Bulldog Drummond
